query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `star_achievements` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `user_id` int NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `situation` text NOT NULL,
  `task` text NOT NULL,
  `action` text NOT NULL,
  `result` text NOT NULL,
  `metric_value` varchar(100),
  `metric_type` varchar(50),
  `category` varchar(100),
  `skills` text,
  `work_experience_id` int,
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (`work_experience_id`) REFERENCES `work_experiences`(`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `writing_samples` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `user_id` int NOT NULL,
  `type` enum('linkedin_post', 'blog_article', 'cover_letter', 'email', 'other') NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255),
  `content` text NOT NULL,
  `source_url` varchar(512),
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `skills_with_levels` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `user_id` int NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `category` varchar(50),
  `proficiency_level` enum('beginner', 'intermediate', 'advanced', 'expert') NOT NULL,
  `years_used` int,
  `last_used` varchar(50),
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `generated_cover_letters` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `user_id` int NOT NULL,
  `job_id` int,
  `application_id` int,
  `content` text NOT NULL,
  `achievement_ids` text,
  `user_rating` int,
  `got_response` int DEFAULT 0,
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (`job_id`) REFERENCES `jobs`(`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (`application_id`) REFERENCES `applications`(`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL
);
